title.en: What issue are you trying to resolve?

instructions.en:
While each environment is different, hopefully many questions and issues can be answered by walking through the following topics.

If you'd like additional information about what it takes to run Owncast, visit server requirements and resources.

text.en: My stream is buffering for viewers.
I am dropping frames while streaming.
I'm seeing video related errors in my logs.
My server hardware is being over-utilized.
Chat is being shown as offline.
I want to reduce the live latency of my stream.
My stream's output is low quality.
My broadcasting software immediately disconnects after I start streaming.
I want to reset my stream key or admin password.
I'm seeing errors about thumbnails in my logs.
I have no idea what's going on. Can't I just talk to somebody?

instructions.en:
Make sure you collect some information about the buffering.

Is it buffering for everyone, or just a specific group? Or is it just one person? If you're not sure, ask your viewers.

text.en: My stream is buffering for everyone.
My stream is fine for some, but buffering for others.
My chat is offline while streaming.
My chat is offline only when I'm not streaming.

title.en: My chat is buffering for some, but not others.

instructions.en: Find out if the people experiencing buffering are because of a specific reason. If you're not sure, ask your viewers.

text.en: It's buffering only for people who are geographically further away from my streaming server.
It's buffering only for people with slower or mobile networks.
